attributes.action:
Economy after covid lockdown high Street
Give back to those who kept Britain
attributes.additional_details: Plough monies in to community high Street for us British people who need our shops. We loose them Goverment will also loose huge amounts if money. Humans need contact & we need our shops. If you loose a loved one you need community shops. One shop shuts. Another does then chemist closes and so forth
attributes.background:
Protect the British worker who suffered after lockdown In retail. Shops were hit bad. December 2023 nobody in my high steet. Retailers at risk
No support at all.. December 14th mall empty. Why ? Goverment need to look after our heritage our retail

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about support for high street businesses, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
